product_name: Patagonia Baby Capilene 3 Midweight Long Underwear Bottoms - Toddlers'
long_description: Great for skiing and backpacking, the Patagonia Baby Capilene 3 Midweight long underwear bottoms for toddlers are highly breathable, moisture wicking and fast drying. Patagonia has reinvented its Capilene(R) performance base layers, making them now from recycled and recyclable synthetic fiber. Gladiodor(R) natural odor control employs benign amino acids to help keep funky scents at bay; plus, it's nonpolluting, safe and durable. Gusseted crotch design moves seams to a more comfortable location and allows unrestricted range of motion. Side seams are positioned a bit forward to create chafe-free comfort. Plush, brushed waistband delivers next-to-skin softness. Patagonia Baby Capilene 3 Midweight bottoms feature flatlock seams that are non-bulky and supple. 100% recyclable through Patagonia's Common Threads Recycling Program-simply return your worn-out item to Patagonia.
